title: Critical Kubernetes Image Builder Vulnerability Exposes Nodes to Root Access Risk
description: A critical security flaw has been disclosed in the Kubernetes Image Builder that, if successfully exploited, could be abused to gain root access under certain circumstances. The vulnerability, tracked as CVE-2024-9486 (CVSS score: 9.8), has been addressed in version 0.1.38.
